name: Wolomo's Dungeons - Gold Adventure
description:
Wolomo Dungeoneering Adventure!
Select the appropriate Wolomo roles to collect more gold coins! !

Three kinds of roles and three types of gameplay:

[Wolomo] : general shape, normal weight, gain 1 times gold, each injured deduct 1 points of life.
[Fat Lomo]: balloon shape, very light, difficult to operate, gain1 times gold, not hurt.
[Gold Lomo]: Gold shape, heavy, moves fast, gain 5 times coins, each injured deduct 3 points of life.

Chose your favorite role, and go fighting in the Gold Coins Game now!
PS: A game for my girlfriend Tutu.


污勒梅地城大冒险！
选择合适的勒梅角色进行金币大收集！！

3种角色3种玩法：
【污勒梅】：普通形态，正常重量，获得1倍金币，每次受伤扣除1点生命。
【胖勒梅】：气球形态，极轻，较难操作，获得1倍金币，不会受到伤害。
【金勒梅】：黄金形态，较重，速度更快，获得5倍金币，每次受伤扣除3点生命。

使用自己最擅长的角色，去进行Gold Coins大角逐吧！

PS：这是一款送给我女朋友凸凸的游戏。
